a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif;font-weight:500

text.tspan: Estimates correspond to the share of the population older than 14 years that is able to read and write.
Data source: WDI, CIA World Factbook, & other sources
Note: Specific definitions and measurement methodologies vary across countries and time. See the 'Sources'-tab for more details.
